quote-05326: {"text":"Kindness is the golden chain by which society is bound together.","author":"Johann Wolfgang von Goethe"}
quote-05327: {"text":"In the long run we get no more than we have been willing to risk giving.","author":"Sheldon Kopp"}
quote-05328: {"text":"We are Divine enough to ask and we are important enough to receive.","author":"Wayne Dyer"}
quote-05329: {"text":"All the world is a stage, And all the men and women merely players.They have their exits and entrances; Each man in his time plays many parts.","author":"William Shakespeare"}
quote-05330: {"text":"Three things cannot be long hidden: the sun, the moon, and the truth.","author":"Buddha"}
quote-05331: {"text":"I am not afraid of tomorrow, for I have seen yesterday and I love today.","author":"William White"}
quote-05332: {"text":"You do not become good by trying to be good, but by finding the goodness that is already within you.","author":"Eckhart Tolle"}
quote-05333: {"text":"When you lose, don't lose the lesson.","author":""}
quote-05334: {"text":"Worry gives a small thing a big shadow.","author":""}
quote-05335: {"text":"Successful people ask better questions, and as a result, they get better answers.","author":"Tony Robbins"}
quote-05336: {"text":"A man of ability and the desire to accomplish something can do anything.","author":"Donald Kircher"}
quote-05337: {"text":"My reputation grows with every failure.","author":"George Shaw"}
quote-05338: {"text":"A good plan today is better than a perfect plan tomorrow.","author":""}
quote-05339: {"text":"The awareness of our own strength makes us modest.","author":"Paul Cezanne"}
quote-05340: {"text":"By letting it go it all gets done. The world is won by those who let it go. But when you try and try. The world is beyond the winning.","author":"Lao Tzu"}
quote-05341: {"text":"A good rest is half the work.","author":""}
quote-05342: {"text":"He who conquers others is strong; He who conquers himself is mighty.","author":"Lao Tzu"}
quote-05343: {"text":"Patience is the companion of wisdom.","author":"Saint Augustine"}
quote-05344: {"text":"Some people thrive on huge, dramatic change. Some people prefer the slow and steady route. Do what's right for you.","author":"Julie Morgenstern"}
quote-05345: {"text":"You do not become good by trying to be good, but by finding the goodness that is already within you.","author":"Eckhart Tolle"}
quote-05346: {"text":"I think somehow we learn who we really are and then live with that decision.","author":"Eleanor Roosevelt"}
quote-05347: {"text":"A man may fulfil the object of his existence by asking a question he cannot answer, and attempting a task he cannot achieve.","author":"Oliver Holmes"}
quote-05348: {"text":"Every man takes the limits of his own field of vision for the limits of the world.","author":"Arthur Schopenhauer"}
quote-05349: {"text":"Count your joys instead of your woes. Count your friends instead of your foes.","author":""}
quote-05350: {"text":"If you break your neck, if you have nothing to eat, if your house is on fire, then you got a problem. Everything else is inconvenience.","author":"Robert Fulghum"}
quote-05351: {"text":"It is not in the stars to hold our destiny but in ourselves.","author":"William Shakespeare"}
quote-05352: {"text":"Take no thought of who is right or wrong or who is better than. Be not for or against.","author":"Bruce Lee"}
quote-05353: {"text":"Weve got to have a dream if we are going to make a dream come true.","author":"Walt Disney"}
quote-05354: {"text":"You can adopt the attitude there is nothing you can do, or you can see the challenge as your call to action.","author":"Catherine Pulsifer"}
quote-05355: {"text":"Follow your instincts. That is where true wisdom manifests itself.","author":"Oprah Winfrey"}
quote-05356: {"text":"A man should look for what is, and not for what he thinks should be.","author":"Albert Einstein"}
quote-05357: {"text":"Those that know, do. Those that understand, teach.","author":"Aristotle"}
quote-05358: {"text":"To be upset over what you don't have is to waste what you do have.","author":"Ken S. Keyes"}
quote-05359: {"text":"When in doubt, tell the truth.","author":"Mark Twain"}
quote-05360: {"text":"Think how hard physics would be if particles could think.","author":"Murray Gell-Mann"}
quote-05361: {"text":"You are important enough to ask and you are blessed enough to receive back.","author":"Wayne Dyer"}
quote-05362: {"text":"Without this playing with fantasy no creative work has ever yet come to birth. The debt we owe to the play of the imagination is incalculable.","author":"Carl Jung"}
quote-05363: {"text":"They can do all because they think they can.","author":"Virgil"}
quote-05364: {"text":"You, yourself, as much as anybody in the entire universe, deserve your love and affection.","author":"Buddha"}
quote-05365: {"text":"We could never learn to be brave and patient if there were only joy in the world.","author":"Helen Keller"}
quote-05366: {"text":"Compassion and happiness are not a sign of weakness but a sign of strength.","author":"Dalai Lama"}
quote-05367: {"text":"I believe that every person is born with talent.","author":"Maya Angelou"}
quote-05368: {"text":"Maxim for life: You get treated in life the way you teach people to treat you.","author":"Wayne Dyer"}
quote-05369: {"text":"Using the power of decision gives you the capacity to get past any excuse to change any and every part of your life in an instant.","author":"Tony Robbins"}
quote-05370: {"text":"An invincible determination can accomplish almost anything and in this lies the great distinction between great men and little men.","author":"Thomas Fuller"}
quote-05371: {"text":"There are people who have money and people who are rich.","author":"Coco Chanel"}
quote-05372: {"text":"The more you know yourself, the more you forgive yourself.","author":"Confucius"}
quote-05373: {"text":"The art of progress is to preserve order amid change, and to preserve change amid order.","author":"Alfred Whitehead"}
quote-05374: {"text":"Never doubt that a small group of thoughtful, committed people can change the world. Indeed. It is the only thing that ever has.","author":"Margaret Mead"}
quote-05375: {"text":"Kind words will unlock an iron door.","author":"Turkish proverb"}
quote-05376: {"text":"Sometimes the most important thing in a whole day is the rest we take between two deep breaths.","author":"Etty Hillesum"}
quote-05377: {"text":"To get the full value of joy you must have someone to divide it with.","author":"Mark Twain"}
quote-05378: {"text":"To make no mistakes is not in the power of man; but from their errors and mistakes the wise and good learn wisdom for the future.","author":"Plutarch"}
quote-05379: {"text":"If you accept the expectations of others, especially negative ones, then you never will change the outcome.","author":"Michael Jordan"}
quote-05380: {"text":"Flow with whatever is happening and let your mind be free. Stay centred by accepting whatever you are doing. This is the ultimate.","author":"Chuang Tzu"}
quote-05381: {"text":"If you want things to be different, perhaps the answer is to become different yourself.","author":"Norman Peale"}
quote-05382: {"text":"I can't change the direction of the wind, but I can adjust my sails to always reach my destination.","author":"Jimmy Dean"}
quote-05383: {"text":"The happiness that is genuinely satisfying is accompanied by the fullest exercise of our faculties and the fullest realization of the world in which we live.","author":"Bertrand Russell"}
quote-05384: {"text":"Everyone should carefully observe which way his heart draws him, and then choose that way with all his strength.","author":"Hasidic saying"}
quote-05385: {"text":"We have committed the Golden Rule to memory; let us now commit it to life.","author":"Edwin Markham"}
quote-05386: {"text":"Where there is great love, there are always miracles.","author":"Willa Cather"}
quote-05387: {"text":"Let go of your attachment to being right, and suddenly your mind is more open. You're able to benefit from the unique viewpoints of others, without being crippled by your own judgement.","author":"Ralph Marston"}
quote-05388: {"text":"To see things in the seed, that is genius.","author":"Lao Tzu"}
quote-05389: {"text":"We must become the change we want to see.","author":"Mahatma Gandhi"}
quote-05390: {"text":"Life a culmination of the past, an awareness of the present, an indication of the future beyond knowledge, the quality that gives a touch of divinity to matter.","author":"Charles A. Lindbergh"}
quote-05391: {"text":"I have often regretted my speech, never my silence.","author":"Publilius Syrus"}
quote-05392: {"text":"Your worst enemy cannot harm you as much as your own unguarded thoughts.","author":"Buddha"}
quote-05393: {"text":"If I know what love is, it is because of you.","author":"Hermann Hesse"}
quote-05394: {"text":"All children are artists. The problem is how to remain an artist once he grows up.","author":"Pablo Picasso"}
quote-05395: {"text":"Patience is a virtue but you will never ever accomplish anything if you don't exercise action over patience.","author":"Byron Pulsifer"}
quote-05396: {"text":"If you have knowledge, let others light their candles in it.","author":"Margaret Fuller"}
quote-05397: {"text":"What you fear is that which requires action to overcome.","author":"Byron Pulsifer"}
quote-05398: {"text":"I will prepare and some day my chance will come.","author":"Abraham Lincoln"}
quote-05399: {"text":"Life's challenges are not supposed to paralyse you, they're supposed to help you discover who you are.","author":"Bernice Reagon"}
quote-05400: {"text":"Think as a wise man but communicate in the language of the people.","author":"William Yeats"}
quote-05401: {"text":"Kind words can be short and easy to speak, but their echoes are truly endless.","author":"Mother Teresa"}
quote-05402: {"text":"No valid plans for the future can be made by those who have no capacity for living now.","author":"Alan Watts"}
quote-05404: {"text":"Many of life's failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up.","author":"Thomas Edison"}
quote-05405: {"text":"Of course there is no formula for success except perhaps an unconditional acceptance of life and what it brings.","author":"Arthur Rubinstein"}
quote-05406: {"text":"Excellence is to do a common thing in an uncommon way.","author":"Booker Washington"}
quote-05407: {"text":"Be kind whenever possible. It is always possible.","author":"Dalai Lama"}
quote-05408: {"text":"The true way to render ourselves happy is to love our work and find in it our pleasure.","author":"Francoise de Motteville"}
quote-05409: {"text":"What we see depends mainly on what we look for.","author":"John Lubbock"}
quote-05410: {"text":"He who experiences the unity of life sees his own Self in all beings, and all beings in his own Self, and looks on everything with an impartial eye.","author":"Buddha"}
quote-05411: {"text":"Sadness flies away on the wings of time.","author":"Jean de la Fontaine"}
quote-05412: {"text":"The only Zen you find on the tops of mountains is the Zen you bring up there.","author":"Robert Pirsig"}
quote-05413: {"text":"You may be deceived if you trust too much, but you will live in torment if you don't trust enough.","author":"Frank Crane"}
quote-05414: {"text":"It is not enough to have a good mind; the main thing is to use it well.","author":"Rene Descartes"}
quote-05415: {"text":"The winds and waves are always on the side of the ablest navigators.","author":"Edward Gibbon"}
quote-05416: {"text":"Victory belongs to the most persevering.","author":"Napoleon Bonaparte"}
quote-05417: {"text":"I believe that every person is born with talent.","author":"Maya Angelou"}
quote-05418: {"text":"It is the quality of our work which will please God, not the quantity.","author":"Mahatma Gandhi"}
quote-05419: {"text":"If one advances confidently in the direction of his dream, and endeavours to live the life which he had imagines, he will meet with a success unexpected in common hours.","author":"Henry David Thoreau"}
quote-05420: {"text":"Sometimes the cards we are dealt are not always fair. However you must keep smiling and moving on.","author":"Tom Jackson"}
